sentences.en: All the rest of them are dancing over his prostrate form.
sentences.cn: 其他人在他身上跳起舞来.

sentences.en: Bundy struck a match and held it over the prostrate figure.
sentences.cn: 邦迪擦了一根火柴照看那个俯卧着的东西.

sentences.en: France no doubt would have lain prostrate under the German rule.
sentences.cn: 法国无疑会屈服在德国的统治之下.

sentences.en: Italy lies prostrate under her miseries and disasters.
sentences.cn: 意大利在贫穷灾祸的重压下已经奄奄一息.

sentences.en: Once France was prostrate, he must if possible conquer or destroy Great Britain.
sentences.cn: 法国一经投降,只要可能, 他就必然要征服或毁灭大不列颠.

sentences.en: Percy was lying prostrate, his arms outstretched and his eyes closed.
sentences.cn: 珀西闭着眼四仰八叉地平躺着。

sentences.en: She was prostrate on the floor.
She was prostrate with grief after his death.
sentences.cn: 她在他死后因悲伤而憔悴了.

sentences.en: The chair collapsed , leaving Jeo prostrate.
sentences.cn: 这把椅一下子散了架,琼摔倒在地.

sentences.en: The insect , writhed, and lay prostrate again.
sentences.cn: 昆虫折腾了几下, 重又直挺挺地倒了下去.

sentences.en: The prisoners were forced to lie prostrate in front of their captors.
sentences.cn: 囚犯们被迫在逮捕他们的那些人面前卧倒.

sentences.en: The Yankees had the South prostrate and they intended to keep It'so.
sentences.cn: 北方佬已经使南方屈服了,他们还打算继续下去.

sentences.en: The young mother was prostrate with grief at her baby's death from pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 年轻妈妈的孩子患肺炎而死去,这使她悲痛欲绝.

sentences.en: They found him lying prostrate on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他们发现他趴在地板上。

sentences.en: They prostrated themselves before their king.
sentences.cn: 他们向他们的国王跪拜行礼。

trans.tran_cn: 卧倒的，被某事物所制服的，瓦解的，无能为力的
trans.tran_en: lying on your front with your face towards the ground

trans.tran_cn: 使下跪鞠躬， 使拜服
trans.tran_en: If you prostrate yourself, you lie down flat on the ground, on your front, usually to show respect for God or a person in authority

trans.tran_cn: 使俯伏，使拜倒，（指疾病、天气等）使某人无能为力
